By increasing its binding affinity to the ACE2 receptor
Through glycosylation modifications that enhance binding
By targeting multiple epitopes on the spike protein simultaneously

It requires complex eukaryotic systems for production
It is unstable at room temperature and requires cold storage
It can only be produced in mammalian cell lines

The S2 subunit of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein
The N-terminal domain of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein

Binding exclusively to the S2 subunit to prevent membrane fusion
